text: ywm alqiamat tabyadd wujuh 'ahl alsaeadat aladhin amanuu biallah wrswlh, wamtthlu amrh, wtaswadd wujuh 'ahl alshqawt mmn kadhabuu rswlh, waeasawua amrh. fa'amaa aladhin aswddat wjwhhm, fyqal lahum twbykhana: 'akafartum baed 'iymankm, fakhtrtm alkufr ealaa al'iyman? fadhuquu aleadhab bsbb kfrkm
